text: Adding a class to a custom module within the custom module itself would be great. When I use it in the email template its given an ID (e.g. hs_cos_wrapper_module_15422952120814413) but this changes on each use. The ID/labels in the template usage section don't seem to be of any use (I want to remove the inherited line-height on the module wrapper, my image isn't sticking to the top otherwise). EDIT: I just fixed it with vertical-align, but still think this would be useful.
can HubSpot buy <http://easyredir.com|easyredir.com> and incorporate into their site migration workflow?  please?
Noticed the new icon field in custom modules yesterday, any chance to add our own icons into the set. Also what set is currently being used?
it uses fontawesome -cant remember what version
